# curl Provider

Make curl requests via Terraform.

## Example Usage

```terraform
// unauthenticated provider
provider "curl" {}

// provider with a oauth2 token to be used for requests
provider "curl" {
    token = ""
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `token` (String, Sensitive)
